thread.title: Barack Obama And Donald Trump Have The Phone Call You’ve Been Waiting For
thread.title_full: Barack Obama And Donald Trump Have The Phone Call You’ve Been Waiting For

author: The Huffington Post News Team
title: Barack Obama And Donald Trump Have The Phone Call You’ve Been Waiting For
text:
Barack Obama And Donald Trump Have The Phone Call You’ve Been Waiting For So YouTube-able. Bill Bradley Associate TV Editor, The Huffington Post Posted: 08/04/2015 09:07 AM EDT | Edited: 30 minutes ago 
Since Gawker apparently gave out Donald Trump's phone number recently, Jimmy Fallon imagined what it would be like if Barack Obama gave him a call with some campaign advice. And, it turns out, it's huuuuge. 
Obama at least attempts to give advice before the convo inevitably turns into nonsense. You'd think it'd be awkward with all the shade Trump has been throwing at the president , but the pair almost immediately bond over Chris Christie jokes and end up singing, in auto-tune, to OMI's " Cheerleader ." 
If anything, this at least gives us hope the pair could reach across the aisle one day, you know, at an OMI concert, anyway. 
"The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon" airs weeknights at 11:35 p.m. ET on NBC.
